Room.Name: Skies Over Kista Forest
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the saddle of a great copper dragon. 70.n0.e23.s7.w0
Room.LongDescription: The beautiful Kista Forest spreads out below you, stretching for as far as you can see. In the skies to the east, you occasionally catch a glimpse of a copper flash in the clouds. There are other riders in the air, but wild copper dragons also inhabit this area.
